questions.question: Has the user participated in at least 5 meetings during the last 14 days?
Are there no gaps larger than 3 days without recorded email activity in the past 30 days?
Is there at least one task updated or completed in the last 7 days?
Does the calendar data include recurring events covering at least 2 different workweeks in the past month?
Has the user created or modified at least 3 unique task categories in the last 30 days?
Are at least 80% of meetings in the past 30 days categorized as recurring or part of a regular schedule?
questions.criteria: Assesses data quality by distinguishing regular vs one-time activities
